name: Health Expenditure - Tanzi & Schuktnecht (2000)
title: Health Expenditure - Tanzi & Schuktnecht (2000)
description: Authors note that years for estimates are approximated to closest estimate available. Data for 1880 is taken from Lindert, Peter H. "The rise of social spending, 1880-1930." Explorations in Economic History 31, no. 1 (1994): 1-37. This one of the sources used by Tanzi & Schuktnecht (2000) for 1910 and 1930.

sources.name: Tanzi & Schuktnecht (2000)
sources.dataPublishedBy: Tanzi, Vito, and Ludger Schuknecht. Public spending in the 20th century: A global perspective. Cambridge University Press, 2000. Page 38.
sources.dataPublisherSource: Compilation of estimates from various sources
sources.additionalInfo: Authors note that years for estimates are approximated to closest estimate available. Data for 1880 is taken from Lindert, Peter H. "The rise of social spending, 1880-1930." Explorations in Economic History 31, no. 1 (1994): 1-37. This one of the sources used by Tanzi & Schuktnecht (2000) for 1910 and 1930.
